channel.title: How to make npcs say whether you're offline or online, using fr33sc4p3 pkz
channel.description: basically that's it. i need to know how to make npcs say whether an admin is online or offline. thank you. tell me what the code is, and where to insert it. thanks again

item.title: How to make npcs say whether you're offline or online, using fr33sc4p3 pkz
item.dc:creator: @h4xx0rz h4xx0rz
item.description:

i did that then compiled it, and it still wont work

item.title: How to make npcs say whether you're offline or online, using fr33sc4p3 pkz
item.dc:creator: @liltwixis11 liltwixis11
item.description:
@liltwixis11 wrote:

search for } else if (npcs[i].IsDead == true) { in npchandler.java. right ABOVE it add this

else if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCHERE) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("NAMEHERE")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "NAMEHERE is online!"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "NAMEHERE is offline!"; } }
change the NAMEHERE’S to your name and the NPCHERE to the npc id u want

Read full topic
item.source: How to make npcs say whether you're offline or online, using fr33sc4p3 pkz
